Text: I'm extremely grateful dmfunk, it's great to see this up, however is there any chance of this torrent without rars?

Thanks dmfunk. This is the best show ever! Does anyone have season2? Cant find it anywhere

Season 2 is considered the extra specials between series 1 and 3, which are the following:

Spinners and Losers
The Rise of the Nutters (also called xmas special)
Opposition Extra

All three specials are floating around torrentland, just do some searching and you'll find :)

Does anyone have any idea where to get the most recent torrents for series 3? I can't believe that a show as brilliantly written and funny as this doesn't have more active torrents. 
If I was in the UK, I would be uploading the most recent episodes, but i'm not, so I can't..
